phrases.phrase: Enable session validation
Verbose output
When enabled, the session validator will set verification headers for Cloudflare security rules based on XenForo's validated sessions.
When enabled, additional headers will be included (user ID, username, staff status, etc.). Disabled by default for minimal header footprint.
Only set headers for Cloudflare requests

When enabled, validation headers will only be sent for requests coming through Cloudflare (detected by CF-Ray and CF-Connecting-IP headers). Recommended for security to prevent exposing user information to non-Cloudflare requests.
Session Validator & Cache Optimizer
Configure session validation and cache optimization settings.
Enable cache optimization
When enabled, sets intelligent cache headers based on content type and age. Only applies to guest visitors.
Force cache headers

When enabled, aggressively overwrites any cache headers set by XenForo or other addons to ensure our settings take precedence. This prevents conflicts with Cloudflare addon or XenForo's internal caching.
Homepage cache duration (seconds)
How long to cache the homepage. Default: 600 (10 minutes)
What's New cache duration (seconds)
How long browsers should cache What's New pages. Default: 300 (5 minutes)
What's New edge cache duration (seconds)
How long CDN/proxies should cache What's New pages (s-maxage). Default: 300 (5 minutes)
Forum listings cache duration (seconds)
How long browsers should cache forum listing pages. Default: 900 (15 minutes)
Forum listings edge cache duration (seconds)
How long CDN/proxies should cache forum listings (s-maxage). Default: 1800 (30 minutes)
Extended nodes cache duration (seconds)
Browser cache duration for extended cache nodes. Default: 3600 (1 hour)
Extended nodes edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache duration (s-maxage) for extended cache nodes. Default: 7200 (2 hours)
Search results cache duration (seconds)
How long browsers should cache search result pages. Default: 1800 (30 minutes)
Search results edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache duration (s-maxage) for search results. Default: 3600 (1 hour)
Members directory cache duration (seconds)
How long browsers should cache member listing pages. Default: 3600 (1 hour)
Members directory edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache duration (s-maxage) for member listings. Default: 7200 (2 hours)
Help pages cache duration (seconds)
How long browsers should cache help pages. Default: 604800 (7 days)
Help pages edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache duration (s-maxage) for help pages. Default: 604800 (7 days)
Media gallery cache duration (seconds)
How long browsers should cache media gallery pages. Default: 1800 (30 minutes)
Media gallery edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache duration (s-maxage) for media gallery. Default: 3600 (1 hour)
Resources cache duration (seconds)
How long browsers should cache resource manager pages. Default: 3600 (1 hour)
Resources edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache duration (s-maxage) for resources. Default: 7200 (2 hours)
Default cache duration (seconds)
Default browser cache duration for unmatched pages. Default: 900 (15 minutes)
Default edge cache duration (seconds)
Default CDN/proxy cache duration (s-maxage) for unmatched pages. Default: 1800 (30 minutes)
Fresh thread cache duration (seconds)
Browser cache duration for threads less than 24 hours old. Default: 600 (10 minutes)
Fresh thread edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for fresh threads. Default: 1800 (30 minutes)
1-7 day old thread cache duration (seconds)
Browser cache duration for threads 1-7 days old. Default: 7200 (2 hours)
1-7 day thread edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for 1-7 day old threads. Default: 21600 (6 hours)
7-30 day old thread cache duration (seconds)
Browser cache duration for threads 7-30 days old. Default: 86400 (1 day)
7-30 day thread edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for 7-30 day old threads. Default: 259200 (3 days)
30+ day old thread cache duration (seconds)
Browser cache duration for threads older than 30 days. Default: 604800 (7 days)
30+ day thread edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for threads older than 30 days. Default: 2592000 (30 days)
Extended cache node IDs
Comma-separated list of forum node IDs that should receive extended cache times (e.g., "4,15,23"). These nodes will use the extended cache settings below.
Homepage edge cache duration (seconds)
Edge cache (s-maxage) duration for homepage. Can be same or higher than browser cache. Default: 600 (10 minutes)
Extended cache: Fresh thread duration (seconds)
Browser cache for fresh threads in extended cache nodes. Default: 3600 (1 hour)
Extended cache: Fresh thread edge duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for fresh threads in extended nodes. Default: 7200 (2 hours)
Extended cache: 1-7 day thread duration (seconds)
Browser cache for 1-7 day threads in extended cache nodes. Default: 86400 (1 day)
Extended cache: 1-7 day thread edge duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for 1-7 day threads in extended nodes. Default: 172800 (2 days)
Extended cache: 7-30 day thread duration (seconds)
Browser cache for 7-30 day threads in extended cache nodes. Default: 604800 (7 days)
Extended cache: 7-30 day thread edge duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for 7-30 day threads in extended nodes. Default: 1209600 (14 days)
Extended cache: 30+ day thread duration (seconds)
Browser cache for threads older than 30 days in extended nodes. Default: 2592000 (30 days)
Extended cache: 30+ day thread edge duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for 30+ day threads in extended nodes. Default: 7776000 (90 days)
Age threshold: Fresh to 1 day (seconds)
Content younger than this is considered "fresh". Default: 86400 (24 hours)
Age threshold: 1 day to 7 days (seconds)
Content older than 1 day but younger than this is "recent". Default: 604800 (7 days)
Age threshold: 7 days to 30 days (seconds)
Content older than 7 days but younger than this is "older". Default: 2592000 (30 days)
Ancient content threshold (seconds)
Content older than this is considered "ancient" and gets maximum cache. Default: 315360000 (10 years)
Ancient content cache duration (seconds)
Browser cache duration for ancient content (e.g., 10+ year old threads). Default: 31536000 (1 year)
Ancient content edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for ancient content. Default: 31536000 (1 year)
Default page cache duration (seconds)
Browser cache duration for unmatched pages. Default: 900 (15 minutes)
Default page edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for unmatched pages. Default: 1800 (30 minutes)
Homepage edge cache duration (seconds)
CDN/proxy cache (s-maxage) for homepage. Default: 600 (10 minutes)
